reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: NGO QESh functions since 2005 and they are an experienced organisation working on promoting and protecting LGBTQ rights. Project overall objective is to increase the visibility and rights of the LGBTQ community in Kosovo through raising awareness of the ge neral public capacity building of institutions and increasing the LGBTQ communities knowledge of their rights. Target groups are: institutions of Kosovo specifically Ombudsperson Institution Kosovo Police and Prime Minister office of Good Governance, Gener al population especially youth and LGBTQ individuals with special focus on Lesbian and Bisexual Women.QESh aims to create a more sensitive and open-minded approach towards the LGBTQ community from the general population. Through different awareness raising campaigns such as producing videos creating a magazine giving lectures at universities the awareness rising of the general population will be increased.
